author: mrglavas
msg: Adding an additional test for the "root-type-definition" property. Patch thanks to Peter McCracken.

author: mrglavas
msg: The "root-type-definition" property was not read by the schema validator during reset.
If the schema validator is not in the pipeline when the property is set the schema
validator will never read the value from the configuration. This bug is fixed thanks
to the patch from Peter McCracken.

author: jlaskowski
msg: Specify the default goal - install - and upgrade plugins: wagon-ssh-external and maven-one-plugin (as it is in geronimo-specs)
